mdRecord.dcterms:title: The Collegian / Conducted by a committee elected by the students of the University of Virginia
Collegian (Charlottesville, Va.)
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: Home Library of the Garnetts of Elmwood (University of Virginia) [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: T223 .H2 1843 no.3: Third of four titles in bound volume. Search by call number to retrieve all titles in the volume. Gift of Marjorie S. Stone, 1997. [original]

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: AP2 .S844 1841 no.4-18: Fourth through eighteenth of twenty-two titles in pamphlet volume with spine title "Southern magazine, Collegian, Univ. of Virginia Sessions 1838-9, 1841-2." Some issues have signature of R. H. Garnett, and annotations identifying authors of unsigned essays. From the Garnett Family Library of Elmwood. Gift of Mrs. J. Clayton Mitchell. Search by call number or keyword to retrieve all titles in the volume. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: LH1 .V6 C7 v. 1, nos. 1-10: Spine and general binding damage. Bound togethe. Signed by James P. Holcombe. From the Holcombe Family Library. Gift of Betty Gereau. [original]

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: AP2 .S844 1841 no.4-18: Fourth through eighteenth of twenty-two titles in pamphlet volume with spine title "Southern magazine, Collegian, Univ. of Virginia Sessions 1838-9, 1841-2." Some issues have signature of R. H. Garnett, and annotations identifying authors of unsigned essays. From the Garnett Family Library of Elmwood. Gift of Mrs. J. Clayton Mitchell. Search by call number or keyword to retrieve all titles in the volume. [original]
